title.rendered: Virat Kohli Out Strolling With Birthday Boy Hardik Pandya In Australia

content.rendered:
India star batter Virat Kohli is out strolling with Hardik Pandya on the all-rounder’s 28th birthday. The former India captain shared a picture of him Hardik and team India opener, KL Rahul, on Instagram which went viral. Team India is now in Australia for the T20 World Cup 2022.

Ahead of the multi-national level grand tournament, India’s players are preparing hard in the nets. But on their off day, the youngsters are out on a stroll Down Under with birthday boy Hardik Pandya. Team India will start their T20 World Cup campaign against arch-rivals Pakistan at the Melbourne Cricket Ground on October 23.

Read also:Women’s Asia Cup 2022: India beats Bangladesh by 59 runs, Shafali Verma shines
